title: They Will Never Stop Hunting You (3C84)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a Nazgul to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Exert a companion bearing a ranged weapon X times, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'They're looking for Baggins, and if they mean well, then I'm a hobbit.'”
Rarity:	C
